1.title: Biografía a través del arte

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Leonardo and Igor Nieto Joly tell their life stories through music and photography.

2.title: Hacia la cima del Izta

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Tania Ximena Ruiz Santos climbs the Iztaccihuatl to register ice formations and then reproduce them in ceramic.

3.title: Neza York

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: "Ciudad Neza" is one of Mexico City's most peculiar neighborhoods. That is where Fershow Escárcega is from and where most of his photo shoots take place.

4.title: Miradas genealógicas

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Tania Bohórquez's father is also her mother's uncle. Incest has always been a part of her life and her art. Her most recent project "Genealogical glances" is a series of portraits of families that have incestuous blood ties.

5.title: Un oficio de hombres

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Luis Enrique García Reyes' father was a truck driver until his death. Now Luis Enrique travels along photographing not only the profession, but the interaction amongst men as well.

6.title: El último viaje de la SEFT-1

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Ivan Puig and Andrés Padilla Domene built the SEFT-1 to travel along the abandoned railroads of the country.

7.title: La mirada de los niños

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Through her photographs, Claudia Hans shows children's conceptions of death, God and family.

8.title: El gesto revolucionario

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Nuria Montiel constructed a mobile printing press to record people's words during demonstrations. Now she is directing a play that evokes with shadows, the gestures of a revolution.

9.title: Retrato de una identificación oficial

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Samara Guzmán Fernández collects the official identifications of strangers. She then draws their portrait based on the photo that appears on the ID and sends it to the address there specified.

10.title: La tautología del miedo

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: In northern Mexico violence has become all too common. José Jiménez Ortiz analyzes the effect of fear and the questions that arise after the death of a loved one due to organized crime.

11.title: Kaleidokleta

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Leika Mochán music interacts with its surroundings. She composes songs that use atmospheric sounds and she takes her music to the streets on her pimped bike.

12.title: La ilusión de lo real

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Fabiola Torres-Alzaga's art challenges reality using optical illusions and the tricks of traditional magic.

13.title: El arte de ser un ama de casa

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Ruvalcaba & Partners is a company that buys ideas for art pieces. Its founder, Daniel Ruvalcaba, is currently working with housewives in order to form an art collection inspired on domestic work.

14.title: La matraca

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Esthel Vera Vogrig designed an interface that detects movement and assigns a note to each one. This way, by dancing one creates music - and with a choreography one composes a song-.

15.title: Lo efímero

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Marcos Castro does interventions in buildings about to be demolished. His work then becomes archaeological ruins.

16.title: Ópera de salsa

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Gabriel Briones designed a special kind of guitar with eleven strings in order to introduce this instrument in his salsa compositions. Now, he's composing the first ever opera in the salsa genre.

17.title: Deconstruyendo el teatro

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Richard Viqueira introduces elements of performance, action movies or video games in his plays.

18.title: El arte es político

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Renato Garza Cervera's pieces touch sensitive subjects such as religion and politics. They do so with a sense of humor that doesn't undermine the seriousness of the message.

19.title: Poemas en Tzotzil

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Angelina Suyul writes poetry, María Arias makes documentary films. The work of both artists serves as a glimpse of the tzotzil language and culture.

20.title: Encuentros

episode of.title: 20 y más por el arte (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Diego Vázquez, choreographer, and Erick Meyenberg, multi-disciplinary artist, revise their projects in the meetings of the FONCA grant for young Mexican artists.

imdb.title: 20 y más por el arte
plot: Portraits of young Mexican artists that received the grant FONCA.::Anonymous
